verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, when they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H4191>died<s%>;

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>, that he <S%H935>come<s%> not at all <S%H6256>times<s%> into the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>, which is upon the <S%H727>ark<s%>; that he <S%H4191>die<s%> not: for I will <S%H7200>appear<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> upon the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat.

<S%H2063>Thus<s%> shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place: with a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>.

He shall put <S%H3847>on<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H3801>coat<s%>, and he shall have the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> upon his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and shall be <S%H2296>girded<s%> with a <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H73>girdle<s%>, and with the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4701>mitre<s%> shall he be <S%H6801>attired<s%>: <S%H1992>these<s%> are <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>; therefore shall he <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and so put them <S%H3847>on<s%>.

And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>kids<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, which is for <S%H1157>himself<s%>, and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself, and for his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>goats<s%>, and <S%H5975>present<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5414>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> upon the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>goats<s%>; <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%>. scapegoat: Heb. Azazel

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> upon which the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5927>fell<s%>, and <S%H6213>offer<s%> him for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>. fell: Heb. went up

But the <S%H8163>goat<s%>, on which the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5927>fell<s%> to be the <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%>, shall be <S%H5975>presented<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> with him, and to let him <S%H7971>go<s%> for a <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, which is for himself, and shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself, and for his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> which is for himself:

And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H4289>censer<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H784>burning<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> from off the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and his <S%H2651>hands<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> beaten <S%H1851>small<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> it <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%>:

And he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7004>incense<s%> upon the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H7004>incense<s%> may <S%H3680>cover<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> that is upon the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, that he <S%H4191>die<s%> not:

And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it with his <S%H676>finger<s%> upon the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%>; and <S%H6440>before<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> shall he <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>.

Then shall he <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, that is for the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> with that <S%H1818>blood<s%> as he <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it upon the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>:

And he shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, because of the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and because of their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> in all their <S%H2403>sins<s%>: and so shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> for the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, that <S%H7931>remaineth<s%> among them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%>. remaineth: Heb. dwelleth

And there shall be no <S%H120>man<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> when he <S%H935>goeth<s%> in to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, until he come <S%H3318>out<s%>, and have made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself, and for his <S%H1004>household<s%>, and for all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for it; and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H8163>goat<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon it with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> it, and <S%H6942>hallow<s%> it from the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And when he hath made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3722>reconciling<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%>:

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%>, and <S%H3034>confess<s%> over him all the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and all their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> in all their <S%H2403>sins<s%>, <S%H5414>putting<s%> them upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8163>goat<s%>, and shall send him <S%H7971>away<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H6261>fit<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: a fit: Heb. a man of opportunity

And the <S%H8163>goat<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> upon him all their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> unto a <S%H776>land<s%> not <S%H1509>inhabited<s%>: and he shall let <S%H7971>go<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>. not: Heb. of separation

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and shall put <S%H6584>off<s%> the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, which he put <S%H3847>on<s%> when he <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and shall <S%H3240>leave<s%> them there:

And he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, and put <S%H3847>on<s%> his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and come <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H6213>offer<s%> his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself, and for the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> shall he <S%H6999>burn<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he that let <S%H7971>go<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> for the <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and the <S%H8163>goat<s%> for the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, whose <S%H1818>blood<s%> was brought <S%H935>in<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, shall one carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>; and they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> their <S%H5785>skins<s%>, and their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and their <S%H6569>dung<s%>.

And he that <S%H8313>burneth<s%> them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And this shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> unto you: that in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, ye shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H4399>work<s%> at all, whether it be one of your own <S%H249>country<s%>, or a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you:

For on that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the priest make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you, to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> you, that ye may be <S%H2891>clean<s%> from all your <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
It shall be a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> unto you, and ye shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls<s%>, by a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, whom he shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%>, and whom he shall <S%H4390>consecrate<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to minister in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%> in his <S%H1>father's<s%> stead, shall make the <S%H3722>atonement<s%>, and shall put <S%H3847>on<s%> the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H899>clothes<s%>, even the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>: consecrate: Heb. fill his hand

And he shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, and he shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and for the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and he shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H6951>congregation<s%>.

And this shall be an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> unto you, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for all their <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%>. And he <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
